name: Car Test Game
description:
This is the first game I'm publishing to itch.io. I made this in a day, hence the poor visual quality. I made this using the now removed Blender Game Engine feature in Blender 2.79b. Feel free to comment if you want. I'll be publishing more of my old work and possibly new work. 

Hopefully, no one will have any problems with playing it. 

-Controls-

W: to go forward

S: to go backward

Mouse/Keypad: to turn
